properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 9:08PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warnings continue for the Tombigbee River at Bevill Lock
and Dam...Gainesville Lock and Dam...and Demopolis Lock and Dam...

.Recent rainfall has produced rises along the Tombigbee River...and
flood warnings remain in effect along the river. Levels should
continue to slowly fall at Gainesville. However...additional rainfall
expected over the next 24 hours could lead to some additional rises
at Bevill and Demopolis.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 6:45 AM Wednesday the stage was 85 feet.
* Flood stage is 68 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will remain steady between 84.5 feet and
85 feet for the next couple of days.
* Impact...At 84 feet...Some industrial and residential flooding
begins just upstream from Demopolis Dam at 88 feet. Widespread
flooding in Greene...Marengo...and Sumter counties occurs and some
evacuations may be necessary.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
